metadata.titleCn: 黑河综合遥感联合试验：PROBA CHRIS遥感数据集
metadata.description:
Proba (project for on board autonomy) is the smallest earth observation satellite launched by ESA in 2001. Chris (compact high resolution imaging Spectrometer) is the most important imaging spectrophotometer on the platform of proba. It has five imaging modes. With its excellent spectral spatial resolution and multi angle advantages, it can image land, ocean and inland water respectively for different research purposes. It is the only on-board sensor in the world that can obtain hyperspectral and multi angle data at the same time. It has high spatial resolution, wide spectral range, and can collect rich information in biophysics, biochemistry, etc. At present, there are 23 scenes of proba Chris data in Heihe River Basin. 
The coverage and acquisition time are as follows: 4 scenes in Arjun dense observation area, 2008-11-18, 2008-12-05, 2009-03-29, 2009-05-22; 1 scene in pingdukou dense observation area, 2009-07-13; 7 scenes in Binggou basin dense observation area, 2008-11-19, 2008-11-26, 2008-12-06, 2009-01-10, 2009-03-04, 2009-03-30, 2009-03-31; dayokou basin dense observation area, 2009-07-13 There are two views in the observation area, 2008-10-23, 2009-06-08; one in Linze area, 2008-06-23; one in Minle area, 2008-10-22; seven in Yingke oasis dense observation area, 2008-04-30, 2008-05-09, 2008-06-04, 2008-07-01, 2008-07-19, 2009-05-31, 2009-08-10. 
The product level is L1 without geometric correction. Except that there are only four angles for the images of 2009-03-29 and 2009-05-24 in the Arjun encrypted observation area, each image has five different angles. 
The remote sensing data set of the comprehensive remote sensing joint experiment of Heihe River, proba Chris, was obtained through the "dragon plan" project (Project No.: 5322) (see the data use statement for details).
metadata.descriptionCn:
PROBA（Project for On-Board Autonomy）小卫星是欧空局于2001年发射的一颗最小的对地观测卫星，CHRIS（Compact High Resolution Imaging Spectrometer）是搭载在PROBA平台上最主要的成像光谱分光计，具有五个成像模式，以其卓越的光谱空间分辨率及多角度的优势为不同的研究目的分别对陆地、海洋及内陆水体进行成像。它是目前世界上唯一可以同时获取高光谱和多角度数据的星载传感器，空间分辨率高，光谱范围宽，在生物物理、生物化学等方面能收集到丰富的信息。黑河流域目前共有PROBA CHRIS数据23景。
覆盖范围和获取时间分别为：阿柔加密观测区4景，时间分别为2008-11-18，2008-12-05，2009-03-29，2009-05-22；扁都口加密观测区1景，时间为2009-07-13；冰沟流域加密观测区7景，时间分别为2008-11-19，2008-11-26，2008-12-06，2009-01-10，2009-03-04，2009-03-30，2009-03-31；大野口流域加密观测区2景，时间分别为2008-10-23，2009-06-08；临泽地区1景，时间为2008-06-23；民乐1景，时间为2008-10-22；盈科绿洲加密观测区7景，时间分别为2008-04-30，2008-05-09，2008-06-04，2008-07-01，2008-07-19，2009-05-31，2009-08-10。
产品级别为L1级，未经过几何校正。除阿柔加密观测区2009-03-29和2009-05-24的影像只有4个角度以外，其余每景影像均有5个角度的不同影像。
黑河综合遥感联合试验PROBA CHRIS遥感数据集通过“龙计划”项目（项目编号：5322）获取（详细信息参见数据使用声明）。

background: Leaf area index (LAI) is one of the important geometric-structure parameters in terrestrial vegetation ecosystems. Accurate LAI retrieval is always a key task of such remote-sensing applications, and it is also a precondition of crop-yield estimation, vegetative evapotranspiration calculation and the energy-exchange evaluation of terrestrial vegetation (Badhwar et al., 1986; Townshend et al., 1988; Baret et al., 1991; Wood et al., 1993; Bonan, 1995; Bicheron et al., 1999; Buermann et al., 2001; Kamalesh et al., 2008). In general, there are three categories of LAI retrieval methods. The first category is experiential inversion method based on Vegetation Index (VI), such as retrieving LAI according to the correlation between the Normalized Difference Vegetation Index (NDVI) and LAI (Turner, 1999; Brown et al., 2000; Haboudane et al., 2004; Wang et al., 2005). Although such an approach is simple and widely-used, its accuracy is very low, and some VI can easily get saturated. The second category can be called the reflectance model inversion method, by which the anisotropic effect caused by sun-object-sensor geometry can be removed, but the effect caused by background variations cannot be avoided, especially within mixed pixels. The complex background inhibits accurate LAI retrieval (Li et al., 1986; Nilson et al., 1989; Chen et al., 1997; Xu, 2005).
research objective: Based on a hybrid canopy reflectance model, a new hyperspectral directional second derivative method (DSD) is proposed in this paper. This method can estimate LAI accurately through analyzing the canopy anisotropy. The study region was situated in Zhangye, Gansu Province, China; hyperspectral and multi-angular images of the study region were acquired via the Compact High-Resolution Imaging Spectrometer/Project for On-Board Autonomy (CHRIS/PROBA), on 4 June 2008.
challenges: The anisotropy of canopy reflectance, variations in background characteristics, and variability in atmospheric conditions constitute three factors that can strongly constrain the accuracy of retrieved LAI. As the derivative method is very sensitive to random noise, we put forward an innovative filtering approach, by which the data can be de-noised in spectral and spatial dimensions synchronously.
methods: After the pre-processing procedures, the DSD method was applied, and the retrieved LAI was validated by ground reference data at 11 sites.
dataset: The study region was situated in Zhangye, Gansu Province, China; hyperspectral and multi-angular images of the study region were acquired via the Compact High-Resolution Imaging Spectrometer/Project for On-Board Autonomy (CHRIS/PROBA), on 4 June 2008.
findings: Results show that the new LAI inversion method is accurate and effective with the aid of the innovative filtering method.
backgroundCn: 叶面积指数（LAI）是陆地植被生态系统中一个重要的几何结构参数。准确的LAI提取始终是遥感应用中的关键任务，也是作物产量估算、植被蒸散计算和陆地植被能量交换评估的前提条件（Badhwar et al., 1986; Townshend et al., 1988; Baret et al., 1991; Wood et al., 1993; Bonan, 1995; Bicheron et al., 1999; Buermann et al., 2001; Kamalesh et al., 2008）。一般来说，LAI提取方法可以分为三类。第一类是基于植被指数（VI）的经验反演方法，例如根据归一化差异植被指数（NDVI）与LAI之间的相关性来提取LAI（Turner, 1999; Brown et al., 2000; Haboudane et al., 2004; Wang et al., 2005）。尽管这种方法简单且广泛使用，但其准确性非常低，并且某些VI容易饱和。第二类可以称为反射率模型反演方法，通过该方法可以消除由太阳-物体-传感器几何引起的各向异性效应，但由于背景变化引起的影响无法避免，特别是在混合像元中。复杂的背景抑制了准确的LAI提取（Li et al., 1986; Nilson et al., 1989; Chen et al., 1997; Xu, 2005）。
research objectiveCn: 基于混合冠层反射模型，本文提出了一种新的高光谱方向二阶导数方法（DSD）。该方法通过分析冠层各向异性，能够准确估计叶面积指数（LAI）。研究区域位于中国甘肃省张掖；研究区域的高光谱和多角度影像于2008年6月4日通过紧凑型高分辨率成像光谱仪/在轨自主项目（CHRIS/PROBA）获取。
challengesCn: 冠层反射率的各向异性、背景特征的变化以及大气条件的变异构成了三个可能严重限制LAI（叶面积指数）提取准确性的因素。由于导数方法对随机噪声非常敏感，我们提出了一种创新的过滤方法，通过该方法可以在光谱和空间维度上同步去噪。
methodsCn: 在预处理程序之后，应用了DSD方法，并在11个地点通过地面参考数据验证了获取的LAI。
datasetCn: 研究区域位于中国甘肃省张掖；通过紧凑型高分辨率成像光谱仪/在轨自主项目（CHRIS/PROBA）于2008年6月4日获取了该区域的高光谱和多角度图像。
findingsCn: 结果表明，新的LAI反演方法在创新过滤方法的帮助下是准确有效的。

Disjunctive.AnswerCn: 高光谱方向二阶导数方法 (DSD)

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used to capture hyperspectral and multi-angular images in terrestrial vegetation ecosystems?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于捕获陆地植被生态系统中高光谱和多角度图像的数据收集方法的示例？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a data collection method is the use of the Compact High-Resolution Imaging Spectrometer (CHRIS) aboard the PROBA satellite, which captures hyperspectral and multi-angular images. This method was used in Zhangye, Gansu Province, China, as part of a study to estimate the leaf area index (LAI) accurately.
Example.AnswerCn: 一种数据收集方法是使用搭载在PROBA卫星上的紧凑型高分辨率成像光谱仪（CHRIS），该仪器捕获高光谱和多角度图像。此方法在中国甘肃省张掖市的研究中被用来准确估计叶面积指数（LAI）。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a challenge faced when retrieving the leaf area index (LAI) from remote sensing data in vegetative ecosystems?
Example.QuestionCn: 从遥感数据中获取叶面积指数（LAI）在植被生态系统中面临的一个挑战是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a challenge is the anisotropy of canopy reflectance, along with variations in background characteristics and atmospheric conditions, which can constrain the accuracy of retrieved LAI. Addressing these factors is crucial for improving the precision of LAI estimations from remote sensing data.
Example.AnswerCn: 一个挑战是冠层反射率的各向异性，以及背景特征和大气条件的变化，这可能限制从遥感数据中获取的叶面积指数（LAI）的准确性。解决这些因素对于提高从遥感数据中估算LAI的精度至关重要。

Example.QuestionEn: Could you provide an example of a dataset that includes both hyperspectral and multi-angular data for studying terrestrial vegetation?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个包含高光谱和多角度数据的示例数据集，用于研究陆地植被？
Example.AnswerEn: A dataset example is the PROBA CHRIS remote sensing dataset, which provides hyperspectral and multi-angular data. This dataset includes images covering areas like Zhangye, Gansu Province, China, which were used to analyze vegetation and estimate parameters such as the leaf area index (LAI).
Example.AnswerCn: 一个数据集示例是PROBA CHRIS遥感数据集，该数据集提供高光谱和多角度数据。该数据集包括覆盖中国甘肃省张掖地区的图像，用于分析植被和估计如叶面积指数（LAI）等参数。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the challenges in accurately retrieving leaf area index (LAI) in remote sensing applications?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在遥感应用中，准确获取叶面积指数（LAI）面临的挑战有哪些？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: anisotropy of canopy reflectance, variations in background characteristics, atmospheric conditions, sensitivity to random noise
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 冠层反射的各向异性、背景特征的变化、大气条件、对随机噪声的敏感性

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the potential sources or methods for expanding datasets related to biophysical and biochemical parameters collected by remote sensing?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 扩展与遥感收集的生物物理和生化参数相关的数据集的潜在来源或方法有哪些？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: hyperspectral images, multi-angular images, canopy anisotropy, directional second derivative method, LAI estimation, data acquisition, data sharing
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 高光谱图像，多角度图像，冠层各向异性，方向二阶导数法，LAI估算，数据采集，数据共享

Definition.QuestionEn: What is the meaning of 'hyperspectral and multi-angular images' in remote sensing data collection?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在遥感数据收集中，“高光谱和多角度图像”的意思是什么。
Definition.AnswerEn: Hyperspectral and multi-angular images refer to data collected from sensors like the CHRIS/PROBA, which are capable of capturing images across a wide spectrum of wavelengths and from multiple angles. This allows for detailed analysis of the Earth's surface, capturing both the spectral and directional properties of reflected light.
Definition.AnswerCn: 高光谱和多角度图像是指从像CHRIS/PROBA这样的传感器收集的数据，这些传感器能够在广泛的波长范围内和多个角度捕捉图像。这使得对地球表面的详细分析成为可能，捕捉到反射光的光谱和方向特性。

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'geometric-structure parameters' mean in the context of terrestrial vegetation ecosystems?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在陆地植被生态系统的背景下，“几何结构参数”指的是描述植被空间分布和形态特征的各种参数。这些参数可以包括植物的高度、密度、冠层结构、叶面积指数等，它们有助于理解植被的生长模式、生态功能和与环境的相互作用。
Definition.AnswerEn: In the context of terrestrial vegetation ecosystems, 'geometric-structure parameters' refer to measurements like the Leaf Area Index (LAI) that describe the physical structure and arrangement of vegetation, which is crucial for understanding light interception, photosynthesis, and energy exchange processes.
Definition.AnswerCn: 在陆地植被生态系统的背景下，“几何结构参数”指的是诸如叶面积指数（LAI）等测量值，这些测量值描述了植被的物理结构和排列，对于理解光的截获、光合作用和能量交换过程至关重要。

Comparison.QuestionEn: In what ways do the challenges of retrieving leaf area index (LAI) using the hyperspectral directional second derivative method compare to those faced by traditional methods based on Vegetation Index (VI)?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 使用高光谱方向二阶导数法获取叶面积指数（LAI）所面临的挑战与基于植被指数（VI）的传统方法相比，有哪些不同之处？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Traditional VI-based methods, while simple and widely used, often suffer from low accuracy and saturation issues. The hyperspectral directional second derivative method, on the other hand, addresses these limitations by analyzing canopy anisotropy and offers improved accuracy. However, it also faces challenges such as sensitivity to random noise, which is mitigated by using an innovative filtering approach.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 传统的基于VI（植被指数）的方法虽然简单且广泛使用，但通常存在准确性低和饱和问题。而高光谱方向二阶导数方法则通过分析冠层各向异性来解决这些局限性，提供了更高的准确性。然而，它也面临着对随机噪声敏感等挑战，这通过采用创新的滤波方法得以缓解。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What underlying factors could explain the high accuracy of LAI retrieval using hyperspectral directional second derivative methods when compared to other retrieval methods?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 哪些潜在因素可以解释使用高光谱方向二阶导数方法进行LAI（叶面积指数）检索时的高准确性，相较于其他检索方法？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The high accuracy of LAI retrieval using hyperspectral directional second derivative methods can be attributed to its ability to analyze canopy anisotropy effectively, as it considers the directional reflectance properties and applies an innovative filtering approach to de-noise the data in both spectral and spatial dimensions, addressing issues of background variations and atmospheric conditions.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 使用高光谱方向二阶导数方法进行LAI检索的高准确性可以归因于其有效分析冠层各向异性的能力，因为它考虑了方向反射特性，并采用了一种创新的过滤方法来在光谱和空间维度上去噪，解决了背景变化和大气条件的问题。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: In what ways can multi-angular imaging data enhance the interpretation of terrestrial vegetation parameters compared to traditional single-angle approaches?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 多角度成像数据如何增强对陆地植被参数的解释，相较于传统的单角度方法？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Multi-angular imaging data enhances the interpretation of terrestrial vegetation parameters by providing multiple perspectives that help in removing anisotropic effects caused by varying sun-object-sensor geometries, which can improve the accuracy of parameters like LAI by allowing for a more comprehensive analysis of the canopy structure.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 多角度成像数据通过提供多个视角来增强对陆地植被参数的解释，这有助于消除由于太阳-物体-传感器几何关系变化而导致的各向异性效应，从而提高像叶面积指数（LAI）等参数的准确性，使得对冠层结构的分析更加全面。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes challenges in retrieving the Leaf Area Index (LAI) using hyperspectral data in remote sensing applications?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在遥感应用中，使用高光谱数据获取叶面积指数（LAI）面临的挑战是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The anisotropy of canopy reflectance, variations in background characteristics, and variability in atmospheric conditions are factors that strongly constrain the accuracy of retrieved LAI. Additionally, the derivative method used in these applications is very sensitive to random noise.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 冠层反射率的各向异性、背景特征的变化以及大气条件的变异是强烈限制LAI（叶面积指数）提取准确性的因素。此外，这些应用中使用的导数方法对随机噪声非常敏感。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why is it important to use multi-angular images in analyzing terrestrial vegetation ecosystems?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在分析陆地植被生态系统时，使用多角度图像的重要性是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Using multi-angular images helps in accurately estimating the Leaf Area Index (LAI) by analyzing the canopy anisotropy, which is crucial due to the complex interactions of light with vegetation structures.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 使用多角度图像有助于通过分析冠层各向异性来准确估计叶面积指数（LAI），这对于光与植被结构的复杂相互作用至关重要。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential consequences of using a hyperspectral directional second derivative method (DSD) for LAI retrieval on the accuracy of vegetative evapotranspiration calculations?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用高光谱方向二阶导数方法（DSD）进行叶面积指数（LAI）提取对植被蒸散发计算准确性的潜在影响是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The use of the hyperspectral directional second derivative method (DSD) for LAI retrieval can lead to accurate estimations of LAI by analyzing canopy anisotropy. This accuracy in LAI retrieval is a precondition for precise vegetative evapotranspiration calculations, suggesting an improvement in the accuracy of such calculations.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用高光谱方向二阶导数法（DSD）进行叶面积指数（LAI）反演可以通过分析冠层各向异性来实现对LAI的准确估计。这种LAI反演的准确性是精确植被蒸散发计算的前提，表明这种计算的准确性有望得到提高。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: How does addressing the anisotropy of canopy reflectance impact the retrieval of accurate LAI in heterogeneous landscapes?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 解决冠层反射率的各向异性对异质景观中准确获取叶面积指数（LAI）有何影响？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Addressing the anisotropy of canopy reflectance impacts the retrieval of accurate LAI by removing the anisotropic effect caused by sun-object-sensor geometry. This allows for more precise LAI estimation even in the presence of complex background variations, which are common in heterogeneous landscapes.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 解决冠层反射率的各向异性影响了LAI的准确检索，通过消除由太阳-物体-传感器几何关系引起的各向异性效应。这使得即使在异质景观中常见的复杂背景变化下，也能更精确地估计LAI。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the implications of implementing an innovative filtering approach for de-noising data in both spectral and spatial dimensions on the data quality?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 在光谱和空间维度上实施一种创新的过滤方法进行去噪的影响是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Implementing an innovative filtering approach for de-noising data in both spectral and spatial dimensions can significantly enhance data quality by reducing random noise. This leads to more reliable data, which is essential for accurate LAI retrieval and subsequent analyses.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 在光谱和空间维度实施一种创新的过滤方法以去噪数据，可以显著提高数据质量，减少随机噪声。这将导致更可靠的数据，这对于准确的叶面积指数（LAI）提取和后续分析至关重要。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What drives the need for innovative filtering approaches when working with hyperspectral datasets in terrestrial ecosystem research?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在陆地生态系统研究中，处理高光谱数据集时，推动创新过滤方法需求的因素是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Innovative filtering approaches are needed to de-noise data in both spectral and spatial dimensions simultaneously, which is vital because the derivative method used for LAI estimation is very sensitive to random noise.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 需要创新的过滤方法来同时在光谱和空间维度上去噪，因为用于LAI估计的导数方法对随机噪声非常敏感。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What methodologies are used to address the challenges of canopy reflectance anisotropy and background variability in data collection for hyperspectral and multi-angular imaging?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 为了解决高光谱和多角度成像中树冠反射各向异性和背景变化的挑战，采用了哪些方法论？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The challenges of canopy reflectance anisotropy and background variability are addressed by employing a new hyperspectral directional second derivative method (DSD) that analyzes canopy anisotropy. Additionally, an innovative filtering approach is applied to de-noise the data in both spectral and spatial dimensions.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 应对树冠反射各向异性和背景变异性挑战的方法是采用一种新的高光谱方向二阶导数方法（DSD）来分析树冠各向异性。此外，还应用了一种创新的滤波方法，以在光谱和空间维度上对数据进行去噪。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How are hyperspectral and multi-angular images preprocessed to ensure accurate biophysical parameter retrieval in remote sensing applications?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 高光谱和多角度图像如何进行预处理，以确保在遥感应用中准确提取生物物理参数？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Hyperspectral and multi-angular images undergo preprocessing procedures to prepare the data for analysis. This includes applying the DSD method and validating the retrieved parameters such as LAI with ground reference data to ensure accuracy.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 高光谱和多角度图像需要经过预处理程序，以准备数据进行分析。这包括应用DSD方法，并通过地面参考数据验证检索参数，如LAI，以确保准确性。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What technological advancements enable the simultaneous acquisition of hyperspectral and multi-angular data in remote sensing applications?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些技术进步使得在遥感应用中能够同时获取高光谱和多角度数据？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The Compact High Resolution Imaging Spectrometer (CHRIS) on the PROBA satellite enables the simultaneous acquisition of hyperspectral and multi-angular data due to its exceptional spectral and spatial resolution and multi-angle capabilities.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 紧凑型高分辨率成像光谱仪（CHRIS）搭载在PROBA卫星上，能够由于其卓越的光谱和空间分辨率以及多角度能力，同时获取高光谱和多角度数据。

Enablement.QuestionEn: In what ways does the use of multi-angular remote sensing data enhance the estimation of vegetation parameters such as the Leaf Area Index (LAI)?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 多角度遥感数据的使用在以下方面增强了对植被参数（如叶面积指数LAI）的估计：
Enablement.AnswerEn: Multi-angular remote sensing data enhances the estimation of the Leaf Area Index (LAI) by allowing for the removal of the anisotropic effects caused by sun-object-sensor geometry, thus improving the accuracy of LAI retrieval.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 多角度遥感数据通过消除由太阳-物体-传感器几何关系引起的各向异性效应，增强了叶面积指数（LAI）的估计，从而提高了LAI提取的准确性。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might it be challenging to collect accurate Leaf Area Index (LAI) data using remote sensing techniques in varied atmospheric conditions?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在不同的大气条件下，使用遥感技术收集准确的叶面积指数（LAI）数据可能会面临挑战。
Expectation.AnswerEn: The anisotropy of canopy reflectance, variations in background characteristics, and variability in atmospheric conditions can strongly constrain the accuracy of retrieved LAI. These factors introduce complexities that affect the remote sensing measurements.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 树冠反射率的各向异性、背景特征的变化以及大气条件的变异会严重限制获取的叶面积指数（LAI）的准确性。这些因素引入了复杂性，影响了遥感测量。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What could be the reasons for the high expectation of using hyperspectral and multi-angular images for enhancing the accuracy of biophysical parameter retrieval?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 使用高光谱和多角度图像提高生物物理参数提取准确性的高期望可能有以下原因：
Expectation.AnswerEn: Hyperspectral and multi-angular images, such as those acquired by the Compact High Resolution Imaging Spectrometer/Project for On-Board Autonomy (CHRIS/PROBA), offer enhanced spectral and spatial resolution that can provide more detailed information about the canopy anisotropy, which is crucial for accurate biophysical parameter retrieval.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 高光谱和多角度图像，例如由紧凑型高分辨率成像光谱仪/在轨自主项目（CHRIS/PROBA）获取的图像，提供了更高的光谱和空间分辨率，可以提供关于冠层各向异性的更详细信息，这对于准确的生物物理参数提取至关重要。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might a new hyperspectral directional second derivative method (DSD) be expected to improve LAI estimation compared to traditional methods?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 为什么新的高光谱方向二阶导数方法（DSD）预计在叶面积指数（LAI）估计方面会比传统方法更有效？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The new hyperspectral directional second derivative method (DSD) is proposed to accurately estimate LAI by analyzing canopy anisotropy. This method is expected to overcome the limitations of traditional methods, such as the sensitivity to random noise, through an innovative filtering approach that de-noises data in spectral and spatial dimensions synchronously.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 提出了一种新的高光谱方向二阶导数方法（DSD），通过分析冠层各向异性来准确估计叶面积指数（LAI）。该方法预计将克服传统方法的局限性，例如对随机噪声的敏感性，采用一种创新的过滤方法，在光谱和空间维度上同步去噪数据。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What are the potential challenges in using the hyperspectral directional second derivative method for LAI retrieval, and how might they be addressed?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 使用高光谱方向二阶导数法进行叶面积指数（LAI）提取的潜在挑战有哪些，以及如何解决这些挑战？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The hyperspectral directional second derivative method faces challenges such as canopy reflectance anisotropy, background variability, and atmospheric conditions, which can affect LAI retrieval accuracy. These challenges may be addressed through innovative filtering approaches that de-noise data in both spectral and spatial dimensions, enhancing the reliability of results.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 高光谱方向二阶导数方法面临着树冠反射各向异性、背景变化和大气条件等挑战，这些因素可能影响叶面积指数（LAI）提取的准确性。这些挑战可以通过创新的滤波方法来解决，这些方法在光谱和空间维度上对数据进行去噪，从而提高结果的可靠性。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I'm unsure about the techniques used to validate the data collected from hyperspectral and multi-angular images in the context of leaf area index (LAI) estimation.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我对在叶面积指数（LAI）估计中用于验证从高光谱和多角度图像收集的数据的技术感到不确定。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The techniques used to validate the data collected include ground reference data at specific sites. The retrieved LAI from the hyperspectral directional second derivative method (DSD) was validated by ground reference data at 11 sites, ensuring accuracy and effectiveness.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 用于验证收集数据的技术包括在特定地点的地面参考数据。通过在11个地点的地面参考数据验证了从高光谱方向二阶导数法（DSD）获取的叶面积指数（LAI），确保了准确性和有效性。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please summarize the challenges faced in data collection for accurate retrieval of leaf area index (LAI) using remote sensing techniques.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn:
在使用遥感技术准确获取叶面积指数（LAI）的数据收集过程中面临的挑战包括：

1. **传感器限制**：不同遥感传感器的空间分辨率、光谱范围和时间频率可能影响LAI的测量精度。
2. **植被类型差异**：不同类型的植被（如森林、草地、农田等）对遥感信号的响应不同，导致LAI估算的复杂性增加。
3. **环境因素影响**：气候、土壤条件和地形等环境因素可能影响植被的生长和LAI的变化，从而影响遥感数据的准确性。
4. **数据处理和模型选择**：LAI的估算通常依赖于复杂的算法和模型，选择不当可能导致结果偏差。
5. **地面验证不足**：缺乏足够的地面实测数据来验证遥感估算结果，可能导致LAI数据的可靠性降低。
6. **云和气候条件**：云层和其他气候条件可能影响遥感影像的获取，导致数据缺失或质量下降。

这些挑战使得通过遥感技术准确获取LAI变得复杂和困难。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The challenges in data collection for accurate retrieval of LAI using remote sensing techniques include the anisotropy of canopy reflectance, variations in background characteristics, and variability in atmospheric conditions. These factors can strongly constrain the accuracy of the retrieved LAI, making it difficult to obtain precise measurements.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 使用遥感技术准确获取叶面积指数（LAI）时，数据收集面临的挑战包括冠层反射率的各向异性、背景特征的变化以及大气条件的变异。这些因素会严重限制LAI的提取精度，使得获得精确测量变得困难。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please analyze the effectiveness of a new hyperspectral directional second derivative method (DSD) in estimating LAI in complex environments.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请分析一种新的高光谱方向二阶导数方法（DSD）在复杂环境中估计叶面积指数（LAI）的有效性。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The new hyperspectral directional second derivative method (DSD) is effective in estimating LAI in complex environments. It accurately analyzes canopy anisotropy and is validated by ground reference data at 11 sites. The results demonstrate the method's accuracy and effectiveness, especially with the aid of an innovative filtering approach that de-noises data in spectral and spatial dimensions.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 新的高光谱方向二阶导数方法（DSD）在复杂环境中有效地估计叶面积指数（LAI）。它准确分析了冠层各向异性，并通过11个地点的地面参考数据进行了验证。结果表明，该方法的准确性和有效性，特别是在一种创新的过滤方法的帮助下，该方法在光谱和空间维度上去噪。
